程序包 prezoom.controller

类 GAttributeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • prezoom.controller.GAttributeManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class GAttributeManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is the manager to manage the state related functions for the attributes of graphical objects. Each GObject has a manager to manage its own attributes.
    作者:
    Zhijie Lan

    create date: 2020/11/6

    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      修饰符和类型 字段 说明
      private GAttributesI cur_Attributes
      the attribute for the current state
      (专用程序包) java.util.ArrayList<GAttributesI> state_Attributes_list
      the list that store all attributes for each state.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器 说明
      GAttributeManager​(java.lang.Double x, java.lang.Double y, java.awt.Color col, java.lang.Boolean filled, java.lang.Integer lineWidth, java.lang.Double width, java.lang.Double height, java.lang.Double x2, java.lang.Double y2, java.lang.Boolean visible, java.lang.String fontName, java.lang.Integer fontStyle, java.lang.Double fontSize, java.lang.String textString)
      To construct a manager, the object's attributes will be generated and duplicated from the current state to the end state, but attributes for states before the current state are set to 0, which means the object only exists from the current state.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void deleteAttributeState​(int state)
      delete the attribute of a given state
      void finishDrawingNew()
      after drawing, add cloned attributes to the following states
      GAttributesI getCur_Attributes()
      get the object's attribute for the current state
      private int getCurrent_State()
      get the state from the state manager
      void insertAttributeState()
      insert a new attribute of a new state into state_Attributes_list at the current state index.
      void updateCur_Attributes()
      update the cur_Attributes.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 字段详细资料

      • state_Attributes_list

        java.util.ArrayList<GAttributesI> state_Attributes_list
        the list that store all attributes for each state.

      • cur_Attributes

        private GAttributesI cur_Attributes
        the attribute for the current state

    • 构造器详细资料

      • GAttributeManager

        public GAttributeManager​(java.lang.Double x,
                         java.lang.Double y,
                         java.awt.Color col,
                         java.lang.Boolean filled,
                         java.lang.Integer lineWidth,
                         java.lang.Double width,
                         java.lang.Double height,
                         java.lang.Double x2,
                         java.lang.Double y2,
                         java.lang.Boolean visible,
                         java.lang.String fontName,
                         java.lang.Integer fontStyle,
                         java.lang.Double fontSize,
                         java.lang.String textString)
        To construct a manager, the object's attributes will be generated and duplicated from the current state to the end state, but attributes for states before the current state are set to 0, which means the object only exists from the current state.
        参数:
        x - location, x
        y - location, y
        col - paint color
        filled - whether filled
        lineWidth - width of lines
        width - width of the object, if applicable
        height - height of the object, if applicable
        x2 - x2 of the object, if applicable
        y2 - y2 of the object, if applicable
        visible - whether visible
        fontName - font name
        fontSize - font size
        fontStyle - plain, bold, or italic
        textString - the text content

    • 方法详细资料

      • getCurrent_State

        private int getCurrent_State()
        get the state from the state manager
        返回:
        the current state number

      • getCur_Attributes

        public GAttributesI getCur_Attributes()
        get the object's attribute for the current state
        返回:
        the attribute

      • updateCur_Attributes

        public void updateCur_Attributes()
        update the cur_Attributes. and add interpolation from previous value to the current value skip if there is no attribute for the current state

      • insertAttributeState

        public void insertAttributeState()
        insert a new attribute of a new state into state_Attributes_list at the current state index. The new attribute will clone the previous info of the current state

      • deleteAttributeState

        public void deleteAttributeState​(int state)
        delete the attribute of a given state
        参数:
        state - the state to be deleted

      • finishDrawingNew

        public void finishDrawingNew()
        after drawing, add cloned attributes to the following states
